title: From Conceptual Spaces to Quantum Concepts: Formalising and Learning Structured Conceptual Models. (arXiv:2401.08585v1 [q-bio.NC])
abstract: In this article we present a new modelling framework for structured concepts using a category-theoretic generalisation of conceptual spaces, and show how the conceptual representations can be learned automatically from data, using two very different instantiations: one classical and one quantum. A contribution of the work is a thorough category-theoretic formalisation of our framework. We claim that the use of category theory, and in particular the use of string diagrams to describe quantum processes, helps elucidate some of the most important features of our approach. We build upon Gardenfors' classical framework of conceptual spaces, in which cognition is modelled geometrically through the use of convex spaces, which in turn factorise in terms of simpler spaces called domains. translated_title: 从概念空间到量子概念：形式化和学习结构化概念模型
translated_abstract: 在本文中，我们提出了一个新的建模框架，使用概念空间的范畴论推广来建立结构化概念，并展示了如何通过两种非常不同的实例（经典和量子）自动地从数据中学习概念表示。该工作的一个贡献是对我们框架进行了彻底的范畴论形式化。我们声称范畴论的使用，特别是使用弦图来描述量子过程，有助于阐明我们方法的一些最重要的特点。我们建立在Gardenfors的概念空间的经典框架之上，该框架通过使用凸空间几何地建模认知，并通过称为域的简单空间分解。我们展示了如何从简单形状的图像中学习形状、颜色、大小和位置等域的概念，其中概念在经典实现中被表示为高斯分布，而在量子实现中被表示为量子态。
tldr: 本文提出了一个新的建模框架，可以使用范畴论的推广来建立结构化概念，并展示了如何通过自动学习从数据中获取概念表示。使用范畴论和弦图描述量子过程有助于揭示该方法的关键特点。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new modeling framework for structured concepts using a categorical generalization of conceptual spaces, and demonstrates how conceptual representations can be learned automatically from data. The use of category theory and string diagrams for describing quantum processes helps elucidate the key features of this approach.
